title: PM chairs meeting on prioritized development package for Sindh districts
content:
ISLAMABAD April 12 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan Monday chaired a meeting over prioritized development package for districts of Sindh province.
The meeting was attended by Sindh Governor Imran Ismail, Minister for Finance Muhammad Hamad Azhar, Minister for Inter-Provincial Coordination Dr Fehmida Mirza, Minister for Planning and Development Asad Umar, Minister for Energy Omar Ayub Khan and senior officials, PM Office media wing in a press release said.
